text: The Lord said to my Lord,110:1 “My Lord”: by the time of the New Testament this was applied to the Messiah, but it is not made explicit in the text here. (See for example Matthew 22:41-46; Mark 12:35-37; Luke 20:41-44). “Sit at my right hand, until I make your enemies a footstool for you.110:1. “Footstool”: A symbol of submission.”
